document.full_text: manny pacquiao has been installed as an odds-on favorite for his wbo welterweight title defense against shane mosley but the filipino has taken great pains not to underestimate his american challenger.
document.title: manny pacquiao respects shane mosley amid intense buildup
lines_and_colors: manny pacquiao has been installed as an odds-on favorite for his wbo welterweight title defense against shane mosley but the filipino has taken great pains not to underestimate his american challenger.
